definition: either of two amphibious reptiles related to crocodiles but with shorter broader snouts, to crack and acquire the appearance of alligator hide, as from weathering or improper application
details:
noun
- either of two amphibious reptiles related to crocodiles but with shorter broader snouts
= synonyms: gator
- leather made from alligator's hide
verb
- to crack and acquire the appearance of alligator hide, as from weathering or improper application
= example: to crack and acquire the appearance of alligator hide, as from weathering or improper application
